data.name: kafeasist
data.description: kafeasist is a café/restaurant/bar management software as a service. kafeasist makes managing your business much more simpler with easy-to-use dashboard. With kafeasist, you won't need any other software to run your business.

data.name: vue-paho-mqtt
data.description: Easy-to-use Paho MQTT client for Vue 3 with centralized subscription management, type support, and built-in optional alert notification library.

data.name: istasyoncikolata
data.description: istasyoncikolata is a website for a restaurant/café built with Astro.
